name: Virtual Kyoutei '99
overview: Virtual Kyotei 99 is the second game in the Nitchibutsu motorboats games for the Playstation console. In these games the player compete in the Virtual Kyoutei tournament that is somekind of motorboats racing in which the player character compete against 5 computer players. This version of the game features different racing game modes. The game features a story mode and different circuits. The game also features a complete database updated to the second semester of the 98 season.
